name: Dr. Birmohan Singh
expertise: Medical Image Processing, Signal Processing, Machine Learning
research: Focus on medical image processing, signal processing, and applications of machine learning in healthcare.
about: Dr. Birmohan Singh is a professor in the Computer Science and Engineering Department with over 30 years of experience. His research focuses on the intersection of medical imaging and machine learning.

name: Dr. B.S. Rakhra
research: Specializes in wireless communication technologies, network security, and applications of IoT in secure communication systems.
about: Dr. B.S. Rakhra is an experienced assistant professor with 25 years in the field of computer networks and IoT, contributing to advancements in secure communication systems.

name: Dr. Rajesh Mehra
research: Research interests include digital signal processing and optimization of VLSI systems for enhanced performance.
about: Dr. Rajesh Mehra is a professor with nearly three decades of expertise in VLSI design and digital signal processing, aiming to innovate in circuit optimization.

name: Dr. Sarabjit Singh
research: Focus on developing secure protocols for wireless sensor networks and enhancing network security measures.
about: Dr. Sarabjit Singh is an assistant professor with a focus on enhancing the security of wireless communication systems through innovative research in sensor networks.

name: Dr. Rajinder Kaur
research: Specializes in data mining techniques and the application of machine learning models for data analysis.
about: Dr. Rajinder Kaur brings 18 years of teaching and research experience in data mining, contributing to advancements in predictive analytics and machine learning.

name: Dr. Balwinder Singh
research: Research in the development of scalable software systems and cloud-based solutions.
about: With 12 years of experience, Dr. Balwinder Singh focuses on software engineering principles and cloud computing to create efficient software solutions.

name: Dr. Rakesh Kumar
research: Focus on AI-driven automation in robotics and intelligent systems for industrial applications.
about: Dr. Rakesh Kumar, an assistant professor, combines expertise in artificial intelligence and robotics to advance research in intelligent automation.

name: Dr. Pardeep Singh
research: Specializes in cloud security, encryption techniques, and building secure cloud infrastructures.
about: Dr. Pardeep Singh is committed to improving cloud security measures and protecting data through his research in encryption and cybersecurity.

name: Dr. Vijay Kumar
research: Exploring efficient data processing techniques and applications of machine learning in big data environments.
about: Dr. Vijay Kumar focuses on leveraging big data analytics and machine learning to extract valuable insights from large datasets.

name: Dr. Tajinder Singh
research: Focuses on text mining techniques for extracting insights from social media and online content.
about: Dr. Tajinder Singh is an assistant professor specializing in text mining and machine learning, applying his research to analyze social media data.

name: Dr. Preetpal Kaur Buttar
research: Developing deep learning models for analyzing satellite imagery and environmental data.
about: Dr. Preetpal Kaur Buttar focuses on remote sensing and deep learning, aiming to improve satellite image analysis for environmental applications.

name: Dr. Jatinder Pal Singh
research: Research on optimizing energy consumption in cloud infrastructures using sustainable approaches.
about: Dr. Jatinder Pal Singh is dedicated to creating sustainable solutions for cloud computing, focusing on green energy optimization.

name: Rahul Gautam
research: Specializes in developing models for image recognition and object detection using deep learning.
about: Rahul Gautam applies his expertise in computer vision and deep learning to solve complex challenges in image processing.

name: Sukhpreet Singh
research: Focuses on efficient data mining techniques and web-based application development.
about: Sukhpreet Singh, with 9 years of experience, specializes in web technologies and data mining, contributing to the development of robust web solutions.

name: Chinu
research: Works on enhancing image processing techniques for better feature extraction and analysis.
about: Chinu focuses on computer vision and image processing, aiming to improve digital image analysis through advanced methods.

name: Dr. Vikash Kumar Garg
research: Research in the field of big data technologies, focusing on distributed data processing with Hadoop and MongoDB.
about: Dr. Vikash Kumar Garg is skilled in big data technologies, with a focus on scalable data processing solutions using Hadoop and MongoDB.

name: Sunita Rani
research: Specializes in deep learning models for effective image retrieval and processing.
about: Sunita Rani's research is centered on applying deep learning to enhance image retrieval techniques, contributing to advancements in image processing.

name: Dr. Utkarsh
research: Research focuses on the application of mathematical models to study information propagation in networks.
about: Dr. Utkarsh explores network theory and its applications in modeling information spread, aiming to improve our understanding of complex networks.

name: Dr. Vinod Kumar Verma
expertise: Internet of Things, Wireless Sensor Networks
research: Researches trust and reputation mechanisms for secure communication in IoT and wireless sensor networks.
about: Dr. Vinod Kumar Verma brings 18 years of experience in IoT and sensor networks, focusing on building trust-based communication systems.
